Defining URL:http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/ValueSet/rtpbc-coverage-determination
Version:0.1.00-DRAFT
Name:CarinRtbpcCoverageDeterminationValueSet
Definition:

This value set contains coverage levels that may apply to a prescription product.

Publisher:CARIN Alliance
Source Resource:XML / JSON / Turtle

This value set is not used

This value set contains coverage levels that may apply to a prescription product.
